Package table

Class Table

java.lang.Object
table.Table
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSV, JSON, TXT
public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements a common dataframe table that will be used by all the dataframes in this project.

    • at

      public TableElement at​(int id, java.lang.String label)
      Returns the value of a single item by row and columName
      Parameters:
      id - row (from 0 to size()-1)
      label - columnName
      Returns:
      TableElement on that position, if not found returns null

    • iat

      public TableElement iat​(int row, int col)
      Returns the value of a single item by row and column position
      Parameters:
      row - row index (from 0 to size()-1)
      col - column index (from 0 to columns()-1)
      Returns:
      TableElement on that position, if not found returns null

      public int columnIndex​(java.lang.String label)

      Parameters:
      label - column name
      Returns:

    • sort

      public Table sort​(java.lang.String label, java.util.Comparator<TableElement> comp)
      Sorts the table by one column and a specific criteria. TableElementComparator inside the package table.element can be used as comp parameter.
      Parameters:
      label - column name
      comp - Comparator that implements a TableElement comparator
      Returns:
      New Sorted table

    • query

      public Table query​(java.lang.String label, java.util.function.Predicate<TableElement> p)
      Filters the table elements by specific criteria. Predicates can be found inside table.element.TableElement class
      Parameters:
      label - column name
      p - predicate that will be used to filter the table
      Returns:
      New filtered table
